part.title: More Information
part.partintro:
&ubuntu-icon;
In this section we will provide you with links and references to valuable external documents and websites that can help you learn to use Ubuntu. We will also describe some applications that can help you to make the 'switch' from another operating system to Ubuntu, and how you can transfer your existing computing skills to the Ubuntu GNU/Linux platform.
You will find the following informatiom in this section:
How to find help via the web, IRC, forums and mailing-lists
Links to documents about Ubuntu GNU/Linux, both technical and organisational
Description of applications that can ease the switch from other operating systems to Ubuntu
